website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use paint that dries flawlessly, perfect for those with little experience.
pros: Available in numerous shades of grey and multiple finishes
Paint and primer combo provides full coverage with one coat
Paint won’t fade or rub off when scrubbing the walls
Contains low odor and low levels of VOC
cons: You may need multiple coats of paint  if trying to cover a previous wall color

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color grey
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Perfect color grey. I was afraid to order a color online first but I’m glad I did. One coat only and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna Klimos

customer_reviews.title: Color descriptions are not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought “black magic” color paint to re paint my black front door. The paint arrived and The paint was quite obviously gray. It was not even close to black. Very disappointed. I’ve opened the can and cannot return it. Now I’m left with a grey streak on my black door and a can of gray magic paint.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: The seal can’t be easily removed
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy paint online again. The product came in a can with a seal on it. I was unable to remove the seal completely on my own. It’s practically impossible. Unfortunately I broke the seal trying to remove it and liquid from the paint bubbles out of the top exposing it to air. My dad finally got the seal off after struggling himself. The paint isn’t usable now because he wasn’t able to come over for a few days. Also can’t be returned. To summarize, I can’t be refunded and I’m out. Buy your paint from a retailer. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Happy with color
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy paint online, but preferred to maintain social distancing and that isn’t possible where I usually purchase paint. The color was well represented online, so I am happy. Paint arrived before stated delivery date. A couple of the can lids were badly dented, but that shouldn’t be an issue. I’ll update after I paint. Hopefully the paint is actually one coat.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: The Best Paint For Horrible Painters!
customer_reviews.text: This paint is amazing. No matter how horrible of a painter you are, and even if it looks like a nightmare applying it, it dries beautifully! I’m in love with this paint and it turned an ugly guest room gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: mirandas

customer_reviews.title: Great experience, will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Phoenix Fossil and it's 100% single coat coverage. Several reviews said it has a blue tint but I tend to disagree. It has a deep hunter green quality but in direct sun. I looked up it's tint properties and technically it belongs in the green family based on those. If you look at my images I hope you can see the sort of green I'm talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: Where'sthe option for zero stars?! The item arrived in this smaller box in top of a larger one. I set it on my hardwood floor not realizing paint was exploded inside and leaking out. I checked the other box outside and it had paint on that as well. I'm sure it also was on the driver and his truck. I cannot use what is even left of this product because given the mess to even get it out of the box in this condition, it'll destroy even more of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Paint
customer_reviews.text: Loved this paint. Was a little worried about it not actually working all that well. But it did exactly as it stated. I was repainting my twin girls bedroom who had a combo of pink and purple paint on their walls and I wanted to change it up to be something a little more classy. I was happy that it only took one coat to cover the paint but also all the delightful pen and marker drawings on their walls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: This is really good paint and it really only takes one coat, but it's got to be a thick coat and it goes along way! I love the color and the shine of the semi gloss! I'll be buying more of this glidden paint in the future when I start my remodel on my basment!
customer_reviews.author: Cody G.

customer_reviews.title: Just truly brace yourself.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve paired my wall, and after a whole month of letting it dry, I decided to go into the room that was painted with this gray paint and wash the walls down with literally only water. I’ve wiped only one spot with bounty paper towel and the paint peeled off the wall like weak dry white glue on a hand. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes chill gray. But not gray off white, perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this paint I ordered chill gray. It's like an off white with the slightest cool tone. I painted over a very brownish taupe in one coat. I'm happy. Will buy again. During COVID I took my chance and it's a winner now I have great looking bedroom walls. For $40 one coat.
customer_reviews.author: Hiromi100

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this paint AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else in quarantine, I am also doing a bunch of home projects. I bought this paint in April along with some Magnolia Home paint (which is fantastic btw). Anywho, I just cracked this open today ready to paint the stripes on my wall and it looks like black/grey water. It was SO LIQUIDITY that I can even use it! I’m so sad because I bought this two months ago! Smh!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: covers very well
customer_reviews.text: Had a large exterior wall that needed attention and after some basic prep (scraping and washing with a mix of water and bleach to help remediate moss and mildew) this paint covered all areas very well with one good coat. It covered the discolored areas extremely well. The paint came in its own protective box with good buffering thanks to the manufacturer. Sometimes if you are just ordering bare paint cans, the vicissitudes of shipping are not kind. The quality of this paint and its packing help to eliminate worry and extra work/coats
customer_reviews.author: Jerem Dick

customer_reviews.title: Super nice paint.
customer_reviews.text: Just fabulous! Really happy with how this is going on, and will be purchasing more in the future. Well shook, quick delivery. Fresh as heck. Purchased a very dark grey brown and could not be more pleased with how true the swatches were.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaur Party

customer_reviews.title: thick high quality paint
customer_reviews.text: This brand of paint is thick and only needs one coat. But, if you buy the color "Thin Ice," be warned that it looks more grey on the screen. It is actually more of a pearly off-white. Still pretty, but not the grey I expected.
customer_reviews.author: PsychologyResearch

customer_reviews.title: Paint spilled all over the bag
customer_reviews.text: Received this paint today. The bag that was holding it was filled with the paint and still wet. I have waited way to long to receive this paint and will have to keep it. Just a nasty mess.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality paint!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality paint! Only needed one coat for the bathroom and hallway and the color was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Insanely beautiful black
customer_reviews.text: I can't give enough compliments to this paint. The black is the perfect shade for accents, and the sheen is also perfect. I used this for some shelves, and it's absolutely amazing how well it turned out. If you want something black as an accent, this is the paint you want.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: BLACK, BLACK, BLACK, BLACK NUMBER ONE
customer_reviews.text: Ok so colour ‘Black Magic’ is BLACK NO. 1 not a less intense black. This is probably as black as paint could get. Goths looking for black paint on Amazon rejoice... this is for you. The picture of the shade this produces seriously needs to be updated to BLACK not some sort of off black.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is really wonderful paint! The coverage is amazing. I only needed one coat to paint my whole front door and I used less than a quarter of the can. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Marsee2017

customer_reviews.title: Great Paint!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best paint we have ever used. We covered old wallpaper that had a red floral design from the 70’s. The combination paint and primer worked perfect and the smell was minimal. Will always buy this paint moving forward
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can order paint online!! Came securely packed with a plastic lid sealer. The color was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: A tad darker then I wanted but I'm working with it n goes really well with my other color I chose for the room
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for shippable paint
customer_reviews.text: Glidden paint is hit or miss sometimes it's a bit watery but it got here in one piece and was as described
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: Great paint you don’t even need to prime your walls before using, only needs one coat and it looks great recommend this paint
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: One Coat
customer_reviews.text: My original order was deemed undeliverable, I was able to get a replacement ordered. I've ordered this paint in other colors and it is FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not correct color.
customer_reviews.text: Was no where near that color. It was basically just white paint. Not what i ordered at all did not even have a grey tint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer1

customer_reviews.title: One coat did the job
customer_reviews.text: Very Very happy with this one coat paint. I would recommend it Painted my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Awesomei

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Amazing paint. Easley one coat over some pretty funky looking walls. I'm extremely happy and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chris 17

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: Better than Home Depot is bher brand it went On smooth no bubbles and would use it again That’s a quote from my painter
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Bange

customer_reviews.title: Best paint out there
customer_reviews.text: This paint is great, I will never use any other paint. Covered sage green on one coat. The color is beautiful also
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this color. Gray, taupe, with a tiny hint of purple. It’s perfect and completely covered in one coat.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: right color but kinda chips
customer_reviews.text: right color but kinda chips after 3 coats when i touched my cabinets the paint was coming off might have been old not sure
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: One coat is truly all it takes.
customer_reviews.text: One coat covered my lime green walls. I used one can to cover my 300 sq foot room with lots of paint left over.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gray seems to be more blue than I would have liked. Good paint though. Only one coat necessary
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Good quality paint. You need only one coat. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa Lena

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This paint is really nice. Dries really fast and is a true one coat paint. I’ve bought more to do other rooms in my house. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bordell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and greatly packaged! Perfect color! Cannot wait to start my projects!
customer_reviews.author: Raven Sleight

customer_reviews.title: Something Extra
customer_reviews.text: Paint has shredded pieces of paper in it. Caused irreparable damage. Poured remaining paint through a strainer and took pictures but amazon no longer allows photos in reviews. Also cannot return or get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: James M Flowers

customer_reviews.title: I got the whirlwind gray one coat paint. Good quality paint.
customer_reviews.text: I use this color for my bathroom. Goes good with any color when you want to switch out the room decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: Whoever sealed this pain can should be sent to the electric chair. Still working on opening it. The instructions online for this seal do not seem to be working. Injured myself in the process. Don't purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G

customer_reviews.title: Lov it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks blueish under certain lights but love the true color and the look!
customer_reviews.author: Loren Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The paint looks so brown I did not like the color at all. What I brought is not what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Marleny Paoli

customer_reviews.title: Nice paint
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color! Fantastic! Added some glitter and it’s really just fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great paint for the price covers a lot of wall space
customer_reviews.text: Loved this paint two cans did one room and one coating my other daughters room and the paint looked amazing
customer_reviews.author: alicia sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, it worked great for my project. I was painting a piece of white furniture black, and it took about two coats, but it looks great once dry.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: i got what i asked for.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great.Only one coat and my wall s were done.Try it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like the packaging, it looks designed to ship well.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: One Coat - Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: Really only took one coat to cover! Bought this for my little boy’s nursery and we love it. Perfect for people who are not painters!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The spare room looked like a bottle of Pepto Bismol! This paint covered that pink up in one coat as promised! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great paint!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the paint! Great color, no need for second coat, dried quickly, looks flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Color is not described as it says don’t buy. I got a gray and it looks more like a light blue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. We loved it. Used in son's room and bathroom. Looks great. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not easy to paint
customer_reviews.text: Needed multiple Coates to cover existing paint even though it was not dark color. Looks good after painting, but I'd suggest using primer first, this alone won't work as good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

product_meta.title: Glidden Interior Paint + Primer: Gray/Antique Silver, One Coat, Eggshell, 1-Gallon
product_meta.description: Color:Antique Silver| Size:1 Gallon, EggshellGlidden One Coat interior acrylic paint is a super-premium paint with one coat coverage* to save you time and money. It has exceptional hide and stain block which means you need fewer coats to hide your common stains and make your walls beautiful. It is a paint with so it can stand up to frequent cleanings. Featuring a hand selected palette of over 300 of our most popular paint colors, one easy coat is all you need!
feature_bullets: One Coat Coverage - Glidden One Coat Interior Paint & Primer has exceptional hide and stain block which means you need fewer coats to hide your common stains and make your walls beautiful.
Makes Walls Washable - Exceptional scrubbability and washability make sure that if anything does get on your finish, it can handle the scrubs to get it off.
Colors Chosen By Experts - These hand-selected beautiful Gray and Black Paint Colors make Glidden One Coat Interior Paint perfect for use in every room of your home.

Looking for another color? Glidden One Coat is also available in over 300 other premium-curated paint colors chosen by professional color experts to make sure your next painting project comes out beautiful.
Low-VOC, Less Stress - As a Low-odor, low-VOC paint Glidden One Coat Paint & Primer In One allows you to paint with less stress and disruption to your daily routine
Available in Flat, Eggshell, and Semi-Gloss - Glidden One Coat Paint & Primer is perfect for every room in your home, whether it is the bathroom, the bedroom, the kitchen, or nursery
Shipped Safely And Securely - Each can of premium Glidden One Coat Paint is shipped safely And securely in so you get your paint quickly without a huge mess

The Glidden paint brand knows paint - From the first latex paints that were developed and marketed under the Glidden brand decades ago, to today’s broad assortment of versatile paints, Glidden Paint makes it easy for homeowners to stop procrastinating and start painting by turning inspiration into action. Nobody can make painting less painful, but Glidden Paint makes it quicker and easier to get started. After all, the sooner you get painting, the sooner you’ll be finished.
Lifetime Guarantee - Glidden one Coat Paint & Primer In One has a Lifetime Guarantee. Please see the can for more details
